answers.answer: I'm due a day after you !! :) this is my second baby and its a boy again so I'm very excited ! I'll most likely be induced cause I have gestational diabetes but just makes me more excited to meet him . I don't have anyyhimgt ready though :/
I have 38 days to go I'm anxious I just want ro meet her I'm a ftm but I'm not nervous I just want to have her in my arms (:
59 days ! Jeez he will be here soon
I'm excited to meet my little man, i'm just worried i won't have anything ready when it seems to be going by so fast now!

question: I have 64 days left until my due date!It's hit me this week just how soon i will have my baby as i leave work in 2 weeks (taking my month of annual leave then starting maternity leave mid-march and due on the 22nd). I'm only leaving so early due to my annual leave and i work in a mental health home so it's dangerous and i'd rather not take any risks with mine or my babies safety.It's gone so quick though and i can imagine it's only going to get quicker as i have yet to move out with my boyfriend and decorate our new house all before baby arrives!
title: Anyone else getting nervous now???
